title: Solotype Resurrection
content:
I’m working on a project that requires some authentic victorian-style typefaces. I have an old solotype catalog which I have been referencing. And while many of the typefaces are common, others aren’t and I can’t even find them via google.

For example,

Grand Wood  
Grandiose  
Lattice  
Madison

Does anyone know if these are digitized and for sale anywhere?

Thanks,  
–Nic

 [‹ Bring out your ligatures.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411025535/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43879 "Go to previous forum topic") [Xanadu ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411025535/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43938 "Go to next forum topic")
author: -A Hound for Ba...

comments.content:
There are some Solotype fonts available at myfonts.com

[http://www.myfonts.com/person/solo/dan/x/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411025535/http:/www.myfonts.com/person/solo/dan/x/ "http://www.myfonts.com/person/solo/dan/x/")
